name: dhaka-mrt-timetable
description: Real-time Dhaka MRT-6 metro train schedule with community verification system

scripts.dev: npm run build && python -m http.server 8000 --directory docs
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Ready for deployment'
scripts.set-password: echo 'Set ADMIN_PASSWORD environment variable and run npm run build'
